Verses: 1 manushar Boomiyinmel Perugath Thuvakki, Avargalukkuk Kumaaraththigal Pirandhapodhu:
2 dhevakumaarar Manushakumaaraththigalai Adhiga Sowndhariyamullavargalendru Kandu, Avargalukkulle Thangalukkup Pengalaith Therindhukondaargal.
3 appozhudhu Karththar: En Aavi Endraikkum Manushanode Poraaduvadhillai; Avan Maamsanthaane, Avan Irukkap Pogira Naatkal Nootrirubadhu Varusham Endraar.

4 annaatkalil Raatchadhar Boomiyile Irundhaargal; Pinbu Dhevakumaarar Manushakumaaraththigalode Koodugiradhinaal, Ivargal Avargalukkup Pillaigalaip Petrapodhu, Ivargalum Poorvaththil Perpetra Manusharaagiya Balavaangalaanaargal.
5 manushanudaiya Akkiramam Boomiyile Peruginadhu Endrum, Avan Irudhayaththu Ninaivugalin Thotramellaam Niththamum Pollaadhadhe Endrum, Karththar Kandu,
6 thaam Boomiyile Manushanai Undaakkinadharkaagak Karththar Manasthaabappattaar; Adhu Avar Irudhayaththukku Visanamaayirundhadhu.

7 appozhudhu Karththar: Naan Sirushtiththa Manushanai Boomiyinmel Vaikkaamal, Manushan Mudharkondu, Mirugangal Oorum Praanigal Aagaayaththup Paravaigal Pariyandhamum Undaayirukkiravaigalai Nikkiragampannuven; Naan Avargalai Undaakkinadhu Enakku Manasthaabamaayirukkiradhu Endraar.
8 novaavukko, Karththarudaiya Kangalil Kirubai Kidaiththadhu.
9 novaavin Vamsavaralaaru: Novaa Than Kaalaththil Irundhavargalukkulle Needhimaanum Uththamanumaayirundhaan; Novaa Dhevanode Sanjariththukkondirundhaan.
10 novaa Sem Kaam Yaappedh Ennum Moondru Kumaararaip Petraan.
11 boomiyaanadhu Dhevanukku Munbaaga Seerkettadhaayirundhadhu; Boomi Kodumaiyinaal Niraindhirundhadhu.
12 dhevan Boomiyaip Paarththaar; Idho Adhu Seerkettadhaayirundhadhu; Maamsamaana Yaavarum Boomiyinmel Thangal Vazhiyaik Keduththukkondirundhaargal.
13 appozhudhu Dhevan Novaavai Nokki: Maamsamaana Yaavarin Mudivum Enakku Munbaaga Vandhadhu; Avargalaale Boomi Kodumaiyinaal Niraindhadhu; Naan Avargalai Boomiyodunkooda Azhiththuppoduven.
14 nee Kopper Maraththaal Unakku Oru Pezhaiyai Undaakku; Andhap Pezhaiyile Araigalai Undupanni, Adhai Ullum Purambumaaga Keelpoosu.
15 nee Adhaip Pannavendiya Vidham Ennavendraal, Pezhaiyin Neelam Munnooru Muzhamum, Adhin Agalam Aimbadhu Muzhamum, Adhin Uyaram Muppadhu Muzhamumaai Irukkavendum.

16 nee Pezhaikku Or Jannalai Undupanni, Melthattukku Oru Muzhath Thaazhththiyile Adhai Seydhumudiththu, Pezhaiyin Kadhavai Adhin Pakkaththil Vaiththu, Keezh Araigalaiyum, Irandaam Thattin Araigalaiyum, Moondraam Thattin Araigalaiyum Pannavendum.
17 vaanaththin Keezhe Jeevasuvaasamulla Sagala Maamsajandhukkalaiyum Azhikka Naan Boomiyinmel Jalappralayaththai Varappannuven; Boomiyilulla Yaavum Maandupom.
18 aanaalum Unnudane En Udanpadikkaiyai Erpaduththuven; Neeyum, Unnodekooda Un Kumaararum, Un Manaiviyum, Un Kumaararin Manaivigalum, Pezhaikkul Pravesiyungal.
19 sagalavidha Maamsamaana Jeevangalilum Aanum Pennumaaga Vagai Ondrukku Ovvoru Jodu Unnudan Uyirode Kaakkappaduvadharku, Pezhaikkulle Serththukkol.

20 jaadhijaadhiyaana Paravaigalilum, Jaadhijaadhiyaana Mirugangalilum, Boomiyilulla Sagala Jaadhijaadhiyaana Oorum Praanigalilum, Vagai Ondrukku Ovvoru Jodu Uyirode Kaakkappaduvadharku Unnidaththile Varakkadavadhu.
21 unakkum Avaigalukkum Aagaaramaaga Sagalavidha Pojanapadhaarththangalaiyum Serththu, Unnidaththil Vaiththukkol Endraar.
22 novaa Appadiye Seydhaan; Dhevan Thanakkuk Kattalaiyittapadiyellaam Avan Seydhu Mudiththaan.
